sentences.en: A utility can emIt'sO 2 only to the extent permitted by its allowances.
sentences.cn: 其效用是保证二氧化硫排放在许可排放量所允许的范围之内.

sentences.en: An influence on a post - synaptic neuron which reduces the probability that the neuron emit a spike.
sentences.cn: 施加在突触后神经元上的、使其减少发出冲动的一种影响.

sentences.en: Emit four vertical line and three horizontal line, plumb below point.
sentences.cn: 可产生四条垂直线和三条水平线, 带下对点.

sentences.en: Emit two vertical line and three horizontal line, plumb below point.
sentences.cn: 可产生二条垂直线和三条水平线, 带下对点.

sentences.en: Execution of the code following the emIt'statement will occur once all slots have returned.
sentences.cn: 一旦所有的槽返回之后,emit语句之后的代码才会被执行.

sentences.en: Fireflies emit light but not heat.
sentences.cn: 萤火虫发光但不放出热.

sentences.en: He did not emit a sound.
It is now unlawful for factories to emit black smoke into the air.
sentences.cn: 工厂向大气中排放黑烟现在是违法的.

sentences.en: It is unlawful for factories to emit black smoke into the air.
sentences.cn: 现在,工厂往空气中排黑烟是违法的.

sentences.en: Most metallic and some nonmetallic elements will emit characteristic radiations.
sentences.cn: 大多数金属和某些非金属元素都会发出特征的射线.

sentences.en: She was heard to emit a cry of horror.
sentences.cn: 人们听到她发出恐怖的叫声.

sentences.en: Stars emit light which contains only certain characteristic wavelengths.
sentences.cn: 恒星发出的光只含有特定的波长.

sentences.en: Suppose the speakers both emit a pure sinusoidal sound wave of constant frequency.
sentences.cn: 假定两个扬声器都发射恒定频率的纯正弦声波.

sentences.en: The emit will return when all slots have returned.
sentences.cn: 当所有插槽返回了,emit才会返回.

sentences.en: The kettle emitted a shrill whistle.
sentences.cn: 水壶发出了刺耳的鸣笛声。

sentences.en: The metal container began to emit a clicking sound.
sentences.cn: 金属容器开始发出咔嗒咔嗒的声音。

sentences.en: They emit high frequency pulses of sound through their mouth or nose which bounce off surfaces and objects around them.
sentences.cn: 它们通过嘴或鼻子发出高频脉冲声，这些脉冲声碰到周围的表面或物体就会反射回来。

trans.tran_en: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc

trans.tran_cn: 散发； 发射； 发表
trans.tran_en: to send out gas, heat, light, sound etc
